item.description: With Keira Knightley. Viggo Mortensen, Michael Fassbender and Vincent Cassel; director David Cronenberg. 99 min Rated R On the eve of World War I, Zurich and Vienna are the setting for a dark tale of sexual and intellectual discovery. Drawn from true-life events, sensuality, ambition and deceit set the scene for the pivotal moment when Jung, Freud and Sabina come together and split apart, forever changing the face of modern thought. Should be rich for discussion! http://amherstcinema....
item.name: A Dangerous Method
